#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
        int withdrawal_amt;
        float initial_amt;
        cin>>withdrawal_amt;
        cin>>initial_amt;
        if(withdrawal_amt%5==0&&withdrawal_amt<=initial_amt-0.5)
        {
            initial_amt-=(withdrawal_amt+0.50);
        }
        printf("%.2f\n", initial_amt);
    return 0;
}
